A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: LOVED IT. Completely delivered. Been a fan since the first Star Wars A New Hope (IV) came out in 1977 and were followed by The Empire Strikes Back (V) and Return of the Jedi (VI). Episodes I\, II\, and III were a disappointment BUT let’s not go there. This last installment is awesome. It weaves both past with new elements and characters truly honoring beloved characters while making it fresh and exciting and new. The worlds\, scenes\, fights\, plot twists\, dialogue and\, best of all\, the characters really made this one great. It made me laugh\, it made me cry and made me want more!
